column4: My computer time is like 30 seconds slow in 10 minutes. Is there something I can do to fix that?
sync the time with a remote location?
yeah, but I can't sync every minute
there's got to be a way to make it more accurate
that doesn't make it more accurate. that just sets it once in awhile.
if I want to keep it accurate within a minute I would literally have to set the time every 5-10 minutes.
how is the internal clock holding up?
so you dont know if the system clock is off then ?
I assumed my system clock was using my internal clock. How do I check internal clock time?
not really sure on that, maybe hit up the 'gO_Ogle'
